section.heading: Parades, assemblages, and displays forbidden.
section.text: It is forbidden to parade, stand, or move in processions or assemblages in said United States Capitol Grounds, or to display therein any flag, banner, or device designed or adapted to bring into public notice any party, organization, or movement, except as hereinafter provided in §§ 10-503.22 and 10-503.23.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 10-503.18 and § 10-503.23.
